class_notes: Cross-listed with NRSG 536MN section 402. For traditional BSN only. Student cannot self-register. Registration will be processed by the Office of Education.
course_description: This theory course focuses on diverse concepts and principles synthesized from the sciences and humanities to the professional practice of psychiatric mental health nursing. This course examines knowledge and skill acquisition to care for the mental health of patients across the continuum of care.
sections: Class Nbr: 6399, Section #: 101, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MF 1-3:15p, Instructor: K. Pfeiffer, Status: Open
